title: Likely cause of genetic change in four species 1

content.question: Assuming that species I is the ancestral species of the group, explain the most likely genetic change that produced the polypeptide in species II and the most likely genetic change that produced the polypeptide in species III.

frqParts.text: Assuming that species I is the ancestral species of the group, explain the most likely genetic change that produced the polypeptide in species II and the most likely genetic change that produced the polypeptide in species III.

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
